title: Here's a quirky little game with excellent sailing ships to explore and battle in
description: Sil Forth is kind of like Wind Waker meets the ship combat from Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag.

title: Latest STALKER 2 trailer takes you into the Noosphere
description: Plus, a polite reminder that you cannot kill God.

title: The fate of Disco Elysium 2 is uncertain, but these games make up for it
description: The Disco-likes are in full swing.

title: Please enjoy this free, weird, and somewhat disconcerting adventure
description: BABBDI is kind of upsetting, but it's also a good walking sim, platformer, adventure hybrid.

title: Dwarf Fortress faces mind-boggling reality of hiring second programmer
description: Twenty-some years of a family affair come to an end.

title: PC Gamer Hardware Awards: The best gaming headsets of 2022
description: For accurate audio look no further than these three gaming headsets. Though only one can be crowned 2022's champion.

title: PC Gamer Hardware Awards: The best microphone of 2022
description: Our three microphone nominees will make you sound like a pro, but which is the best of the year?

title: In this, the blandest year for PC gaming tech only Valve took a risk
description: You could argue that there have been advances at the highest end of the market, but that's of zero relevance to the vast majority of PC gamers.

title: Microsoft's 'normcore' clothing line had me feeling highly inappropriate
description: Wearing a slogan like that is bound to raise some eyebrows.

title: So, so many Vampire Survivors clones came out this year
description: If you were bitten by the "auto-attacking roguelite shooter with increasingly ridiculous power-ups" genre bug this year, your cup runneth over.

title: 2023's looking like another banger year for deckbuilders
description: Here are 11 deckbuilders (out of many, many more on the way) to keep an eye on.

title: The best rhythm game finally came to PC this year and took over my life
description: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva MegaMix+ coming to PC has meant I can stop relying on consoles for my rhythm game goodness.

title: GOTY Runner Up 2022: Marvel's Midnight Suns
description: The superhero game of our dreams.

title: The PC finally got a Smash Bros. worth celebrating in 2022
description: MultiVersus was one of the year's best surprises, and it keeps getting better.

title: Today's Wordle 558 answer and hint for Thursday, December 29
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #558 puzzle.

title: These 4TB m.2 SSDs are among the cheapest we've seen
description: Though this could just be the beginning for PCIe 4 SSD deals.

title: Nvidia's RTX 4070 Ti preorder price in China isn't pretty
description: Cards starting at over $1k USD is not what we were hoping for.

title: Try the demo for Outpath, a fusion of Minecraft and clicker games
description: It's an odd combo, let's see how it plays out.
